## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G19280](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G19280)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>KAPP, RAG1</u>
- **Gene Name:** kinase associated protein phosphatase, ROOT ATTENUATED GROWTH 1
- **Description:**   kinase associated protein phosphatase;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2150220

- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
